segments.text: I notice the boy climbing on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his body upward, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his hand reaching into the jar, trying to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, and it looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's being really reckless right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in his other hand, probably to catch more cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe he's taking such a risk just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl standing nearby, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be encouraging him, which is not helpful at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should stop them before they get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is still unaware, drying dishes like nothing's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
